scripts.db:pull: npm run ensure:dirs && wrangler d1 export ttv-admin --remote --no-schema --output ./.tmp/data.sql
scripts.db:truncate: wrangler d1 execute ttv-admin --local --persist-to .wrangler\dev-state --command "PRAGMA foreign_keys=OFF; DELETE FROM user_badges; DELETE FROM creator_page_versions; DELETE FROM creator_pages; DELETE FROM admins; DELETE FROM badges; DELETE FROM users;"
scripts.dev:sync-db: npm run db:pull && npm run db:truncate && npm run db:seed
scripts.dev:sync-and-run: npm run dev:sync-db && npm run dev:https
